title: Immunity | Chiropractic Physician in Gardner, KS | Jeurink Family Chiropractic and Wellness Center
description: Immunity in Gardner, KS. Jeurink Family Chiropractic and Wellness Center is your local Chiropractic Physician in Gardner serving all of your needs. Call us today at (913)856-4595 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to our page on Immunity! We believe the health of our immune system is key to reduce your risk with viruses and disease. Check out some research based information below and contact us today if you'd like more personal information for yourself and your family. [An overall look at boosting the Immune System](/storage/app/media/immune-lecture.pdf) MORE RESEARCH..........
